sys_ui_action.name: Regenerate PDF

sys_update_version.name: sys_ui_action_b0fb0b01dbda8850eb4e18df4b961916
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_ui_action"><sys_ui_action action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><action_name>Regenerate PDF</action_name><active>true</active><client>false</client><client_script_v2/><comments/><condition>gs.hasRole('x_cria_livestock_t.admin')</condition><form_action>true</form_action><form_button>false</form_button><form_button_v2>false</form_button_v2><form_context_menu>true</form_context_menu><form_link>true</form_link><form_menu_button_v2>false</form_menu_button_v2><form_style/><hint/><isolate_script>false</isolate_script><list_action>false</list_action><list_banner_button>false</list_banner_button><list_button>false</list_button><list_choice>false</list_choice><list_context_menu>false</list_context_menu><list_link>false</list_link><list_save_with_form_button>false</list_save_with_form_button><list_style/><name>Regenerate PDF</name><onclick/><order>50</order><script><![CDATA[createAttachments();
function createAttachments(){

	var t = {};
	t.related = [];
	t.rFields = '';
	t.rFields_array = [];
	t.view = 'print_cvi';
	t.table = 'x_cria_livestock_t_saleyard_release';
	t.attachments = [];
	var rows = 0;

	// Lookup information for selected record
	var articleGR = new GlideRecord(t.table);
	articleGR.get(current.sys_id);
	t.rTable ='x_cria_livestock_t_batchfill_saleyard_release';

	t.sys_id = current.sys_id;
	t.showAttachments = false;
	if (articleGR.display_attachments)
		t.showAttachments = true;
	t.offercontent = articleGR.getValue('offercontent');

	// Collect information from form
	/*t.number = articleGR.getDisplayValue('record_id');
	t.different_origin = articleGR.getDisplayValue('u_origin_address_different');
	t.different_dest = articleGR.getDisplayValue('u_dest_address_different');
	t.consignor = articleGR.getDisplayValue('consignor_name');
	t.consignor_street = articleGR.getDisplayValue('consignor_street');
	t.consignor_city = articleGR.getDisplayValue('consignor_city') + ", " + articleGR.getDisplayValue('consignor_state') + " " + articleGR.getDisplayValue('consignor_zip');
	t.consignor_phone = articleGR.getDisplayValue('consignor_phone');
	t.consignor_county = articleGR.getDisplayValue('origin_county');
	t.origin_address = articleGR.getDisplayValue('u_origin_address') + ", " + articleGR.getDisplayValue('origin_state') + " " + articleGR.getDisplayValue('u_origin_zip');
	t.consignee = articleGR.getDisplayValue('consignee_name');
	t.consignee_street = articleGR.getDisplayValue('conisgnee_street');
	t.consignee_city = articleGR.getDisplayValue('consignee_city') + ", " + articleGR.getDisplayValue('consignee_state') + " " + articleGR.getDisplayValue('consignee_zip');
	t.consignee_phone = articleGR.getDisplayValue('consignee_phone');
	t.dest_address = articleGR.getDisplayValue('u_dest_address') + ", " + articleGR.getDisplayValue('u_dest_state') + " " + articleGR.getDisplayValue('u_destination_zip');
	t.entry_permit = articleGR.getDisplayValue('entry_permit_number');
	t.inspection_date = articleGR.getDisplayValue('inspection_date');
	t.ship_date = articleGR.getDisplayValue('shipment_date');
	t.carrier = articleGR.getDisplayValue('carrier_name_and_address');
	t.num_animals = articleGR.getDisplayValue('number_animals_shipped');

	t.cert_num = articleGR.getDisplayValue('record_id');
	t.brand_insp = articleGR.getDisplayValue('brand_inspection_number');
	t.signed_date = articleGR.getDisplayValue('signature_date');
	t.movement_purpose = articleGR.getDisplayValue('u_movement_purpose');
	t.remarks = articleGR.getDisplayValue('cvi_remarks');
	t.id_marks = articleGR.getDisplayValue('identifying_marks');
	t.dsa_herd = articleGR.getDisplayValue('u_dsa_herd');
*/
t.number = articleGR.getDisplayValue('record_id');
	t.different_origin = articleGR.getDisplayValue('u_origin_address_different');
	t.different_dest = articleGR.getDisplayValue('u_dest_address_different');
	t.consignor = articleGR.getDisplayValue('slyd_consignor_name');
	t.consignor_street = articleGR.getDisplayValue('slyd_consignor_street');
	t.consignor_city = articleGR.getDisplayValue('slyd_consignor_city') + ", " + articleGR.getDisplayValue('slyd_consignor_state') + " " + articleGR.getDisplayValue('slyd_consignor_zip');
	t.consignor_phone = articleGR.getDisplayValue('consignor_phone');
	t.consignor_county = articleGR.getDisplayValue('u_county');
	t.origin_address = articleGR.getDisplayValue('u_origin_address') + ", " + articleGR.getDisplayValue('origin_state') + " " + articleGR.getDisplayValue('u_origin_zip');
	t.consignee = articleGR.getDisplayValue('slyd_consignee_name');
	t.consignee_street = articleGR.getDisplayValue('slyd_consignee_street');
	t.consignee_city = articleGR.getDisplayValue('slyd_consignee_city') + ", " + articleGR.getDisplayValue('slyd_consignee_state') + " " + articleGR.getDisplayValue('slyd_consignee_zip');
	t.consignee_phone = articleGR.getDisplayValue('consignee_phone');
	t.dest_address = articleGR.getDisplayValue('u_dest_address') + ", " + articleGR.getDisplayValue('u_dest_state') + " " + articleGR.getDisplayValue('u_destination_zip');
	t.entry_permit = articleGR.getDisplayValue('entry_permit_number');
	t.inspection_date = articleGR.getDisplayValue('inspection_date');
	//t.ship_date = articleGR.getDisplayValue('shipment_date');
	//t.carrier = articleGR.getDisplayValue('carrier_name_and_address');
	t.release = articleGR.getDisplayValue('slyd_release_date');
	t.release_reason = articleGR.getDisplayValue('reason_for_release');
	t.num_animals = articleGR.getDisplayValue('u_number_of_animals_shipped');
	t.tb_free = articleGR.getDisplayValue('slyd_tb_free');
	t.bruc_free = articleGR.getDisplayValue('slyd_brucellosis_free');
	t.cert_num = articleGR.getDisplayValue('record_id');
	t.brand_insp = articleGR.getDisplayValue('brand_inspection');
	t.signed_date = articleGR.getDisplayValue('signature_date');
	t.remarks = articleGR.getDisplayValue('slyd_area_remarks');
	t.saleyrd = articleGR.getDisplayValue('u_saleyard');
	t.id_marks = articleGR.getDisplayValue('identifying_marks');
	t.dsa_herd = articleGR.getDisplayValue('dsa_herd');

	//Check to see if attachments are present.
	var atta = new GlideRecord('sys_attachment');
	atta.addEncodedQuery('content_typeLIKEimage^table_sys_id=' + current.sys_id);
	atta.query();
	rows = atta.getRowCount()/3;
	rows = Math.ceil(rows);
	while(atta.next()){
		t.attachments.push('sys_attachment.do?sys_id='+ atta.sys_id);

	}

	// Query for Vet information
	t.vet = articleGR.getDisplayValue('u_veterinarian');
	t.vet_sig = articleGR.getValue('u_vet_sig');
	var grvet = new GlideRecord('sys_user');
	grvet.addQuery('sys_id', articleGR.getValue('u_veterinarian'));
	grvet.query();
	if(grvet.next()){
		t.vet_name = grvet.getDisplayValue('name');
		t.vet_street = grvet.getDisplayValue('street');
		t.vet_city = grvet.city + ", " + grvet.state + " " + grvet.zip;
		t.vet_phone = grvet.getDisplayValue('phone');
		t.vet_email = grvet.getDisplayValue('email');
		t.vet_usda = grvet.getDisplayValue('x_cria_livestock_t_u_usda_accred');
		t.vet_lic = grvet.getDisplayValue('x_cria_livestock_t_u_state_lic');
	}

	// check species check boxes and populate data
	t.num_of_beef = articleGR.getDisplayValue('num_beef_cattle');
	t.num_of_dairy = articleGR.getDisplayValue('num_dairy_cattle');
	t.num_of_goats = articleGR.getDisplayValue('num_goats');
	t.num_of_horses = articleGR.getDisplayValue('num_horses');
	t.num_of_sheep = articleGR.getDisplayValue('num_sheep');
	t.num_of_swine = articleGR.getDisplayValue('num_swine');
	t.num_of_poultry = articleGR.getDisplayValue('num_poultry');
	t.num_of_other = articleGR.getDisplayValue('num_other');
	t.beef = articleGR.getValue('num_beef_cattle');
	if(t.beef > 0){
		if(t.species_field == null){
			t.species_field = "Beef Cattle";
		}else{
			t.species_field = t.species_field + ", Beef Cattle";
		}
		t.cattle = true;
		t.vaccination_status = articleGR.getDisplayValue('bruce_vacc_status');
		t.num_of_cows = articleGR.getDisplayValue('num_of_cows');
		t.num_of_bulls = articleGR.getDisplayValue('num_of_bulls');
		t.num_of_heifers = articleGR.getDisplayValue('num_of_heifers');
		t.num_of_calves = articleGR.getDisplayValue('num_of_calves');
		t.num_of_steers = articleGR.getDisplayValue('num_of_steers');
	}
	t.dairy = articleGR.getValue('num_dairy_cattle');
	if(t.dairy > 0){
		if(t.species_field == null){
			t.species_field = "Dairy Cattle";
		}else{
			t.species_field = t.species_field + ", Dairy Cattle";
		}
		t.cattle = true;
		t.vaccination_status = articleGR.getDisplayValue('bruce_vacc_status');
		t.num_of_bulls = articleGR.getDisplayValue('num_of_bulls');
		t.num_of_cows = articleGR.getDisplayValue('num_of_cows');
		t.num_of_heifers = articleGR.getDisplayValue('num_of_heifers');
		t.num_of_calves = articleGR.getDisplayValue('num_of_calves');
		t.num_of_steers = articleGR.getDisplayValue('num_of_steers');
	}
	t.goat = articleGR.getValue('num_goats');
	if(t.goat > 0){
		if(t.species_field == null){
			t.species_field = "Goats";
		}else{
			t.species_field = t.species_field + ", Goats";
		}
	}
	t.horses = articleGR.getValue('num_horses');
	if(t.horses > 0){
		if(t.species_field == null){
			t.species_field = "Horses";
		}else{
			t.species_field = t.species_field + ", Horses";
		}
	}
	t.sheep = articleGR.getValue('num_sheep');
	if(t.sheep > 0){
		if(t.species_field == null){
			t.species_field = "Sheep";
		}else{
			t.species_field = t.species_field + ", Sheep";
		}
	}
	t.swine = articleGR.getValue('num_swine');
	if(t.swine > 0){
		if(t.species_field == null){
			t.species_field = "Swine";
		}else{
			t.species_field = t.species_field + ", Swine";
		}
	}
	t.poultry = articleGR.getValue('num_poultry');
	if(t.poultry > 0){
		if(t.species_field == null){
			t.species_field = "Poultry";
		}else{
			t.species_field = t.species_field + ", Poultry";
		}
	}
	t.other_spec = articleGR.getValue('num_other');
	if(t.other_spec > 0){
		if(t.species_field == null){
			t.species_field = "Other - " + articleGR.getDisplayValue('species_other');
		}else{
			t.species_field = t.species_field + ", Other - " + articleGR.getDisplayValue('species_other');
		}
	}

	//End variable grab

	var PDF_HTML = '';
	var imggif = "data:image/gif;base64,";

	PDF_HTML = '<div class="panel-heading"><h4 class="panel-title" align="right">Saleyard Release Number: <font color="red" style="font-weight: bold;">' + t.number + '</font></h4></div><table width="100%" align="center" style="border-color: #000000; margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto;" border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="3"><tr><td valign="top" width="25%" style="text-align:left; font-size: 6.5pt;">Idaho State Department of Agriculture<br>Division of Animal Industries<br>2270 Old Penitentiary Road<br>Boise, ID 83712<br>(208) 332-8540</td><td width="50%" style="padding:0px; text-align:center;"><b><font size="4"><center>IDAHO CERTIFICATE OF VETERINARY INSPECTION</center></font></b></td><td width="25%"><img align="right" src="' + imggif + '" alt="logo"/></td></tr></table><div align="center" style="position: absolute; top:175px; left:30px; width:95%;">';

	PDF_HTML = PDF_HTML + '<div><table width="99%" align="center" style="border-color: #000000; margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto;" border="1" cellspacing="1" cellpadding="3"><tr style="background-color: #cccccc;"><th width="33%" style="padding:5px; font-size:8; text-align:center;"><b>Consignor - Contact at Origin</b></th><th width="33%" style="padding:5px; font-size:8; text-align:center;"><b>Consignee - Contact at Destination</b></th><th width="33%" style="padding:5px; font-size:8; text-align:center;"><b>Shipment Information</b></th></tr><tr><td valign="top" style="text-align:left; font-size:7; padding:1px;"><label><strong>Name: </strong>' + t.consignor + '<br><strong>Physical Address: </strong>' + t.consignor_street + '<br><strong>City, State, Zip: </strong>' + t.consignor_city + '<br><strong>Phone: </strong>' + t.consignor_phone + '<br><strong>County: </strong>' + t.consignor_county;

	if(t.different_origin == 'true'){
		PDF_HTML = PDF_HTML + '<br><strong>Mailing Address: </strong>' + t.origin_address;
	}
	PDF_HTML = PDF_HTML + '</label></td><td valign="top" style="text-align:left; font-size:7; padding:1px;"><label><strong>Name: </strong>' + t.consignee + '<br><strong>Physical Address: </strong>' + t.consignee_street + '<br><strong>City, State, Zip: </strong>' + t.consignee_city + '<br><strong>Phone: </strong>' + t.consignee_phone;

	if(t.different_origin == 'true'){
		PDF_HTML = PDF_HTML + '<br><strong>Mailing Address: </strong>' + t.dest_address;
	}

	PDF_HTML = PDF_HTML + '</label></td><td valign="top" style="text-align:left; font-size:7; padding:1px;"><label><strong>Carrier: </strong>' + t.carrier + '<br><strong>Entry Permit #: </strong>' + t.entry_permit + '<br><strong>Brand Inspection #: </strong>' + t.brand_insp + '<br><strong>Movement Purpose: </strong>' + t.movement_purpose + '<br><strong>Inspection Date: </strong>' + t.inspection_date + '<br><strong>Shipment Date: </strong>' + t.ship_date + '<br><strong>Total # of Animals: </strong>' + t.num_animals + '<br><strong>Species: </strong>' + t.species_field + '</label></td></tr></table></div>';

	PDF_HTML = PDF_HTML + '<table width="99%" align="center" style="table-layout:fixed; border-color: #000000; margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto;" border="0" cellspacing="1" cellpadding="3"><tr align="center" style="background-color: #cccccc;"><th align="center" style="text-align:center; font-size:8;"><b>Veterinary Certification</b></th></tr></table><table width="99%" align="center" style="table-layout:fixed; border-color: #000000; margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto;" border="1" cellspacing="1" cellpadding="3"><tr><td style="text-align: center; font-size: 6pt;">I certify, as an accredited veterinarian, the animals in this shipment have been inspected and are free from signs of infectious disease (except where noted).</td></tr></table>';

	PDF_HTML = PDF_HTML + '<table width="99%" align="center" style="table-layout:fixed; border-color: #000000; margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto;" border="1" cellspacing="1" cellpadding="3"><tr><td width="50%" valign="top" style="text-align: left; font-size: 7pt; display: inline-block; overflow-wrap: break-all; white-space: pre-wrap;"><strong>Veterinarian: </strong>' + t.vet_name + '<br><strong>USDA Accreditation #: </strong>' + t.vet_usda + '<br><strong>State License #: </strong>' + t.vet_lic + '</td><td width="50%" valign="top" style="text-align: left; font-size: 7pt; display: inline-block; overflow-wrap: break-all; white-space: pre-wrap;"><strong>Address: </strong>' + t.vet_street + '<br><strong>City, State, Zip: </strong>' + t.vet_city + '><br><strong>Phone: </strong>' + t.vet_phone + '<br><strong>Email: </strong>' + t.vet_email + '</td></tr><tr><td style="text-align: left; font-size: 7pt; display: inline-block; overflow-wrap: break-all; white-space: pre-wrap;"><strong>Digital Signature: </strong>' + t.vet_sig + '</td><td style="text-align: left; font-size: 7pt; display: inline-block; overflow-wrap: break-all; white-space: pre-wrap;"><strong>Date: </strong>' + t.signed_date + '</td></tr></table></div><br>';

	PDF_HTML = PDF_HTML + '<div><table width="99%" align="center" style="border-color: #000000; margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto;" border="1" cellspacing="1" cellpadding="3"><tr><th width="33%" style="padding:5px; text-align:center; font-size:8;"><b>Summary of Shipment</b></th><th width="33%" style="padding:5px; text-align:center; font-size:8;"><b>State / Area Status</b></th><th width="33%" style="padding:5px; text-align:center; font-size:8;"><b>Remarks</b></th></tr><tr><td valign="top" style="text-align:left;">';

	if (t.num_of_beef > 0){
		PDF_HTML = PDF_HTML + '<p style="font-size:7pt;"><strong>Number of Beef Cattle: </strong>' + t.num_of_beef + '</p>';
	}
	if (t.num_of_dairy > 0){
		PDF_HTML = PDF_HTML + '<p style="font-size:7pt;"><strong>Number of Dairy Cattle: </strong>' + t.num_of_dairy + '</p>';
	}
	if (t.num_of_goats > 0){
		PDF_HTML = PDF_HTML + '<p style="font-size:7pt;"><strong>Number of Goats: </strong>' + t.num_of_goats + '</p>';
	}
	if (t.num_of_horses > 0){
		PDF_HTML = PDF_HTML + '<p style="font-size:7pt;"><strong>Number of Horses: </strong>' + t.num_of_horses + '</p>';
	}	
	if (t.num_of_sheep > 0){
		PDF_HTML = PDF_HTML + '<p style="font-size:7pt;"><strong>Number of Sheep: </strong>' + t.num_of_sheep + '</p>';
	}
	if (t.num_of_swine > 0){
		PDF_HTML = PDF_HTML + '<p style="font-size:7pt;"><strong>Number of Swine: </strong>' + t.num_of_swine + '</p>';
	}
	if (t.num_of_poultry > 0){
		PDF_HTML = PDF_HTML + '<p style="font-size:7pt;"><strong>Number of Poultry: </strong>' + t.num_of_poultry + '</p>';
	}
	if (t.num_of_other > 0){
		PDF_HTML = PDF_HTML + '<p style="font-size:7pt;"><strong>Number of Other: </strong>' + t.num_of_other + '</p>';
	}

	PDF_HTML = PDF_HTML + '<br>';
	if (t.cattle == true){
		PDF_HTML = PDF_HTML + '<p style="font-size:8pt;"><u><strong>Summary of Cattle       </strong></u></p>';
		if (t.num_of_bulls > 0){
			PDF_HTML = PDF_HTML + '<p style="font-size:7pt;"><strong>Number of Bulls: </strong>' + t.num_of_bulls + '</p>';
		}
		if (t.num_of_steers > 0){
			PDF_HTML = PDF_HTML + '<p style="font-size:7pt;"><strong>Number of Steers: </strong>' + t.num_of_steers + '</p>';
		}
		if (t.num_of_cows > 0){
			PDF_HTML = PDF_HTML + '<p style="font-size:7pt;"><strong>Number of Cows: </strong>' + t.num_of_cows + '</p>';
		}
		if (t.num_of_heifers > 0){
			PDF_HTML = PDF_HTML + '<p style="font-size:7pt;"><strong>Number of Heifers: </strong>' + t.num_of_heifers + '</p>';
		}
		if (t.num_of_calves > 0){
			PDF_HTML = PDF_HTML + '<p style="font-size:7pt;"><strong>Number of Calves: </strong>' + t.num_of_calves + '</p>';
		}
	}
	PDF_HTML = PDF_HTML + '</td><td valign="top"  style="text-align:left; padding:5px; font-size:7pt;">';

	PDF_HTML = PDF_HTML + '<div><strong>TB Free:</strong> Yes<br><strong>Brucellosis Free:</strong> Yes<br></div>';
	if(t.dsa_herd == 'Yes'){
		PDF_HTML = PDF_HTML + '<div><input type="checkbox" ng-checked="true" disabled="disabled"><strong>Designated Surveillance Area (DSA) origin: </strong>Yes<br></div>';
	}
	else if(t.dsa_herd == 'No' && (t.num_of_beef > 0 || t.num_of_dairy > 0)){
		PDF_HTML = PDF_HTML + '<div><input type="checkbox" ng-checked="true" disabled="disabled"><strong>Designated Surveillance Area (DSA) origin:</strong> No<br></div>';
	}
	var remarks_HTML = '</td><td valign="top" style="padding:1px; text-align:left; font-size: 7pt; overflow-wrap: break-all; white-space: pre-wrap;">';
	/*
if(t.attachments.length > 0){
	var ia;
PDF_HTML = PDF_HTML + '<div align="center" style="width: 99%;"><h4 style="margin-left:25px;"><strong>Attachments</strong></h4><div>';
	for(ia = 0; ia <= t.attachments.length || 3; ia++){
		var sa = new GlideSysAttachment();
		if(t.attachments[ia].size_bytes < 625000){
        var binData =   sa.getBytes(t.attachments[ia]);
		var encData =   StringUtil.base64Encode(binData);
		var imgtype = t.attachments[ia].content_type;
		var imgstr = imgtype + encData;
		PDF_HTML = PDF_HTML + '<div class="col-sm-4"><img ng-src="' + binData + '" height="150px" style="padding-top: 15px"></div>';
		}
	}
	PDF_HTML = PDF_HTML + '<br>';
}
*/	

	var animal_HTML = '';
	var OCV = {state:'false', value:'all_vacc_legible_tattoos', html:'All officially vaccinated with legible tattoos'};
	var NV = {state:'false', value:'not_vaccinated', html:'Not Vaccinated'};
	var MV = {state:'false', value:'mixed_vacc_status', html:'Mixed vaccination status'};
	var UK = {state:'false', value:'unknown_vacc_status', html:'Unknown vaccination status'};
	var breakcount = 0;

	// Query for related animal records

	var gr = new GlideRecord('x_cria_livestock_t_batchfill_saleyard_release');
	gr.addQuery('parent', t.sys_id);
	gr.orderBy('number');
	gr.query();
	while (gr.next()){
		if(gr.u_vacc_status != '' && gr.u_vacc_status != null){
			switch(gr.u_vacc_status.toString()){
				case OCV.value:
					OCV.state = 'true';
					gs.log('OCV');
					break;
				case NV.value:
					NV.state = 'true';
					gs.log('NV');
					break;
				case MV.value:
					MV.state = 'true';
					gs.log('MV');
					break;
				case UK.value:
					UK.state = 'true';
					gs.log('UK');
			}
		}
		if(breakcount != 1){
			animal_HTML = animal_HTML + '<table width="99%" align="center" style="border-color: #000000; margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto;" border="1" cellspacing="1" cellpadding="3"><tr><td valign="top" style="font-size: 7pt; width: 25%; text-align:top;"><p><strong>Official Identification</strong></p><p>' + gr.official_identification + '</p></td><td valign="top" style="font-size: 7pt; width: 25%;"><p><strong>Alternate ID</strong></p><p>' + gr.alt_id + '</p></td><td valign="top" style="font-size: 7pt; width: 20%;"><p><strong>Age (In Months)</strong></p><p>' + gr.age + '</p></td><td valign="top" style="font-size: 7pt; width: 15%;"><p><strong>Sex</strong></p><p>' + gr.sex + '</p></td><td valign="top" style="font-size: 7pt; width: 15%;"><p><strong>Breed</strong></p><p>' + gr.breed + '</p></td></tr></table><table width="99%" align="center" style="border-color: #000000; margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto;" border="1" cellspacing="1" cellpadding="3"><tr><td valign="top" style="font-size: 7pt; width: 25%;"><Strong>Disease Surveillance: </strong>' + gr.u_disease_surveillance + '</td></tr></table><br>';
			breakcount++;
		}
		else{
			animal_HTML = animal_HTML + '<table width="99%" align="center" style="border-color: #000000; margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto;" border="1" cellspacing="1" cellpadding="3"><tr><td valign="top" style="font-size: 7pt; width: 25%; text-align:top;"><p><strong>Official Identification</strong></p><p>' + gr.official_identification + '</p></td><td valign="top" style="font-size: 7pt; width: 25%;"><p><strong>Alternate ID</strong></p><p>' + gr.alt_id + '</p></td><td valign="top" style="font-size: 7pt; width: 20%;"><p><strong>Age (In Months)</strong></p><p>' + gr.age + '</p></td><td style="font-size: 7pt; width: 15%;"><p><strong>Sex</strong></p><p>' + gr.sex + '</p></td><td valign="top" style="font-size: 7pt; width: 15%;"><p><strong>Breed</strong></p><p>' + gr.breed + '</p></td></tr></table><table width="99%" align="center" style="border-color: #000000; margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto;" border="1" cellspacing="1" cellpadding="3"><tr><td valign="top" style="font-size: 7pt; width: 25%;"><Strong>Disease Surveillance: </strong>' + gr.u_disease_surveillance + '</td></tr></table><br><br>';
			breakcount++;
		}
	}
	if(OCV.state == 'true' || NV.state == 'true' || MV.state == 'true' || UK.state == 'true'){
		remarks_HTML = remarks_HTML + '<strong>Vaccination Status:</strong>';
		if(OCV.state == 'true' && (NV.state == 'false' && MV.state == 'false' && UK.state == 'false')){
			remarks_HTML = remarks_HTML + OCV.html;
		}
		else if(MV.state == 'true' || OCV.state == 'true'){
			remarks_HTML = remarks_HTML + MV.html;
		}
		else if(UK.state == 'true'){
			remarks_HTML = remarks_HTML + UK.html;
		}
		else{
			remarks_HTML = remarks_HTML + NV.html;
		}
		remarks_HTML = remarks_HTML + '<br>';
	}
	remarks_HTML = remarks_HTML + t.remarks + '</td></tr></table></div><br>' + '<table width="99%" align="center" style="table-layout:fixed; border-color: #000000; margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto;" border="0" cellspacing="1" cellpadding="3"><tr align="center" style="background-color: #cccccc;"><th align="center" style="text-align:center; font-size:8;"><strong>Animal Information</strong></th></tr></table>';

	PDF_HTML = PDF_HTML + remarks_HTML;
	PDF_HTML = PDF_HTML + animal_HTML;
	var PDF = Class.create();

	PDF.prototype = Object.extendsObject(global.AbstractAjaxProcessor, {

		_document : null,

		example : function (){

			this.createPDF(PDF_HTML,   //HTML to convert to PDF

						   'x_cria_livestock_t_saleyard_release',   //Attach PDF to table

						   current.sys_id, //Attach PDF to record/sys_id

						   current.record_id + " " + current.getDisplayValue('slyd_consignor_name') + " " + current.signature_date + ".pdf");   //attachment filename

		},

		createPDF : function(html, table, sys_id, filename) {

			var pdfDoc = new GeneralPDF.Document(true, null, null, null, null, null);

			this._document = new GeneralPDF(pdfDoc);

			this._document.startHTMLParser();

			this._document.addHTML(html);

			this._document.stopHTMLParser();

			this._saveAs(table, sys_id, filename);

		},

		_saveAs : function (table, sys_id, filename){

			var att = new GeneralPDF.Attachment();

			att.setTableName(table);

			att.setTableId(sys_id);

			att.setName(filename);

			att.setType('application/pdf');

			att.setBody(this._document.get());

			GeneralPDF.attach(att);


		},



		type: 'PDF'


	});


	PDF.prototype.example();

	current.setWorkflow(false);
}]]></script><show_insert>false</show_insert><show_multiple_update>false</show_multiple_update><show_query>false</show_query><show_update>true</show_update><sys_class_name>sys_ui_action</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>tsears</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2020-01-11 00:46:07</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>b0fb0b01dbda8850eb4e18df4b961916</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Regenerate PDF</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Livestock Tracking" source="x_cria_livestock_t">7b1a2026dba09700df68f2b6ae96198c</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Livestock Tracking">7b1a2026dba09700df68f2b6ae96198c</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ui_action_b0fb0b01dbda8850eb4e18df4b961916</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>tsears</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2020-01-11 00:46:58</sys_updated_on><table>x_cria_livestock_t_saleyard_release</table><ui11_compatible>true</ui11_compatible><ui16_compatible>false</ui16_compatible></sys_ui_action></record_update>
